name: emailthing
description: A web app for receiving and sending your emails!
author: RiskyMH (https://riskymh.dev)

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && bun build src/sdk.ts src/cli.ts --outdir dist --sourcemap # && bun run --silent build:cli
scripts.build:cli: bun --cwd=../../apps/cli run build && cp -r ../../apps/cli/dist dist/cli && (find dist/cli -type f -name '*.js' -exec sed -i '' 's/\@emailthing\/cli/emailthing/g' {} +) && cp -r ../../apps/cli/README.md dist/cli
